name: TinyIpAddress

delimiter.description: Set the separator between IP segments, and the default icon is IconDotIpv4
delimiter.description_zh: 设置 ip 段之间的分隔符，默认图标为 IconDotIpv4

disabled.description: Sets the disabled properties of the text

readonly.description: Sets the read-only properties of the text

size.description: The size of the address input box

type.description: Set the type of IP address input box
type.description_zh: 设置 ip 地址输入框的类型

v-model.description: Set the binding value of the address input box
v-model.description_zh: 设置地址输入框的绑定值

events.name: blur
events.description: Triggers an event when a text box loses focus
events.description_zh: 文本框失去焦点时触发事件

events.name: change
events.description: The content of the text box changes after the event
events.description_zh: 文本框内容改变后事件

events.name: focus
events.description: Triggers an event when a text box gets focus
events.description_zh: 文本框获取焦点时触发事件

events.name: input
events.description: An event is triggered when the text box content is entered
events.description_zh: 文本框内容输入时触发事件

events.name: select
events.description: An event is triggered when the text box content is selected
events.description_zh: 文本框内容选中时触发事件

slots.name: default
slots.description: Default slots, separators between custom IP segments
slots.description_zh: 默认插槽，自定义 ip 段之间的分隔符

description: IP 地址输入框与 HTML 原生的 IpAddress 组件保持一致，同时提供数据绑定功能。
description_zh: IP 地址输入框与 HTML 原生的 IpAddress 组件保持一致，同时提供数据绑定功能。
